00030 void parsename(char *name, char *filename) {
00031         char *period=strchr(filename, '.');
00032         int len=period==NULL?strlen(filename):period-filename;
00033         strncpy(name, filename, len);
00034         name[len]='\0';
00035 }
00041 int     main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00042 
00043         Run::init(argc,argv);
00044         Domain domain(Run::inputfile);
00045         if(Run::option.xterm)printf("%c[2J",ESC);
00046         int niter=IO::getIter(Run::configfile);
00047         if(niter<=0) { 
00048                 cout<<"Number of iterations "<<niter<<" should be > 0\nAborting\n";
00049                 exit(0);

00051         domain.run(IO::getIter(Run::configfile));

00054         else parsename(taskname, Run::programname);
00055         domain.save(taskname);
00056         cout<<"RUN FINISHED\n";cout.flush();
